com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class ColumnLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.ColumnLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class ColumnLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    ColumnLayout renders its items in columns.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Mark Reeves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths. Using a column width of 0 will make the width undefined in the UI. This may then be used for application level styling with CSS for responsive design.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined.

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
            ColumnLayout.Alignment[] columnAlignments)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths and column alignments.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined
        columnAlignments - the column alignments

      • ColumnLayout

        @Deprecated
public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
                       int hgap,
                       int vgap)
        Deprecated. use ColumnLayout(int[], Size, Size)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the columns
        vgap - the vertical gap between the rows

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
            Size hSpace,
            Size vSpace)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined
        hSpace - the space between the columns
        vSpace - the space between the rows

      • ColumnLayout

        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.

        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined
        columnAlignments - the column alignments
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the columns

        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units, 0 for undefined.
        columnAlignments - the column alignments
        hSpace - the space between the columns
        vSpace - the space between the rows

    • Method Detail

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(int col,
                ColumnLayout.Alignment alignment)
        Sets the alignment of the given column. An IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown if col is out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        col - the index of the column to set the alignment of.
        alignment - the alignment to set.

      • getHorizontalGap

        public Size getHorizontalGap()
        Returns:
        the horizontal space between the cells

      • getVerticalGap

        public Size getVerticalGap()
        Returns:
        the vertical space between the cells

      • getHgap

        @Deprecated
public int getHgap()
        Deprecated. use getHorizontalGap()
        Returns:
        the horizontal gap between the cells measured in pixels

      • getVgap

        @Deprecated
public int getVgap()
        Deprecated. use getVerticalGap()
        Returns:
        the vertical gap between the cells, measured in pixels

      • getColumnWidth

        public int getColumnWidth(int columnIndex)
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - the index of the column to retrieve the width for.
        Returns:
        the width of the given column.
